sentences.en: "I know you," he said flatly, matter-of-fact, neutral in tone.
sentences.cn: “我认识你。”他平淡地说道，就事论事，不带任何感情。

sentences.en: A neutron is simply a neutral particle in the nucleus of an atom.
sentences.cn: 中子就是原子核里不带电的粒子。

sentences.en: At the horizon the land mass becomes a continuous pale neutral grey.
sentences.cn: 陆地在地平线处变成了一片浅灰。

sentences.en: Clive decided to adopt a neutral position.
sentences.cn: 克莱夫决定采取中立立场。

sentences.en: Graham put the van in neutral and jumped out into the road.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆把货车挂到空挡，自己跳到马路上。

sentences.en: I always tried to remain neutral when they started arguing.
sentences.cn: 他们争论起来的时候我总是努力保持中立。

sentences.en: In addition to the 81 positive comments, 26 students had neutral, mixed, negative or off topic views.
sentences.cn: 除了81条正面评价之外，有26位学生的观点或中立，或褒贬参半，或负面，甚或跑了题。

sentences.en: In that war England was not an ally; she was neutral.
sentences.cn: 在那场战争中,英国不同任何一国结盟, 保持中立.

sentences.en: Isabel put her magazine down and said in a neutral voice, "You're very late, darling."
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔放下杂志，平静地说道：“亲爱的，你来得太晚了。”

sentences.en: It was a good game to watch for the neutrals.
sentences.cn: 对于中立观众来说，这是一场精彩的比赛。

sentences.en: Journalists are supposed to be politically neutral.
sentences.cn: 新闻工作者在政治上应持中立态度。

sentences.en: Mary suggests using a neutral lip pencil.
sentences.cn: 玛丽建议用浅色唇线笔。

sentences.en: Pure water is neutral with a pH of 7.
sentences.cn: 纯水是中性的，酸碱度为7。

sentences.en: The British government acted as a neutral observer during the talks.
sentences.cn: 英国政府在会谈中扮演了中立观察员的角色。

sentences.en: The fiction that "he" is a neutral shorthand for "he or she" is no longer acceptable to many.
sentences.cn: 认为“他”是“他或她”的中性简称的这种说法，很多人已不再接受。

sentences.en: the neutral language of an official news report
sentences.cn: 官方新闻报道采用的中性语言

sentences.en: They picked up momentum, then slipped into neutral and coasted quietly down the slope.
sentences.cn: 他们加大油门，再切入空挡，随后没大响动地滑下山坡。

sentences.en: Those who had decided to remain neutral in the struggle now found themselves required to take sides.
sentences.cn: 那些先前决定在争斗中保持中立的人现在发现他们需要表明立场了。

sentences.en: Three in every five interviewed felt that the Budget was neutral and they would be no better off.
sentences.cn: 五分之三的受访者觉得该预算案不好不坏，他们的境况不会好到哪里去。

sentences.en: When you have two adversaries negotiating, you need to be on neutral territory.
sentences.cn: 让敌对双方坐下来谈判时，你得保持中立。

words.tran_cn: 中性的；不及物的；无性的
无性动物；中性名词；阉割动物
[化学] 中和；[化学] 中和作用；中立状态
中立化（neutralize的过去式和过去分词）
抵销；使…中和；使…无效；使…中立
中立国；中立者；非彩色；齿轮的空档

phrases.tran_cn: 中性气氛；中性大气；中性蒙气
中性洗涤剂，中性去污剂
空档位置；中间位置；中性位置；空挡

trans.tran_cn: 中立的，（化学中）中性的，暗淡的，不带电的
trans.tran_en: not supporting any of the people or groups involved in an argument or disagreement

trans.tran_cn: （汽车或其他机器的）空挡位置，中立人士，中立国，素净色
trans.tran_en: a country, person, or group that is not involved in an argument or disagreement
